snippet: This season, at 24, Matt Harvey proved he was among the best pitchers in the game. But perhaps he still must learn the finer points of being a star, as evidenced Wednesday, when his radio appearance with Dan Patrick turned awkward.
abstract: This season, at 24, Matt Harvey proved he was among the best pitchers in the game. But perhaps he still must learn the finer points of being a star, as evidenced Wednesday, when his radio appearance with Dan Patrick turned awkward.
